title: Cognitive Load Theory and Practical Measurement Methods: Experimental Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Cognitive Psychology Concepts and Experience with Fundamental Educational Assessment Tools
context.additional_context: Learners are undergoing social sector vocational training, are proficient with digital devices, and require mastery of cognitive load management techniques for real-world problem-solving

learning_goals: Explain the correlation between cognitive load and task difficulty in real educational contexts
Apply cognitive load analysis methods using neurophysiological measurement tools such as EEG, EDA, and PPG
Quantify cognitive load through self-report questionnaires and enhance result interpretation skills
Design cognitive load optimization strategies in complex learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
